B      000101       000101 0000000000000000000000 0111   <- Two zeros to end of address
BGT    001100       010101 0000000000000000001100 1100   <- One zero to end of address
BGE    101010       010101 0000000000000000001010 1010
BLT    001101       010101 0000000000000000001000 1011
BLE                 010101 0000000000000000000110 1101
BEQ                 010101 0000000000000000000100 0000
BNE                 010101 0000000000000000000010 0001
